DefaultIntent: Thanks for trying quick answer, how can I help you today?
AccountCancellationIntent: I am so sorry to hear that. Can you please provide the reason for cancellation?
CancellationReasonIntent: I am so sorry that you are not fully happy with our services. Initiating the cancellation, subscription will be cancelled in 5 working days
RefundReasonIntent: Extremely sorry about that. Please be assured you will receive a refund in 5 working days
TitleIntent: Can you please elaborate the question, so the experts can clearly understand and provide a suitable answer?
QuestionIntent: Your question is posted. We will let you know as soon as an expert has provided an answer. Thank you for using quick answer, have a wonderful day
